effect.sun_moon: Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a damaging move this turn. Inflicts 1.5× the damage that move did to the user. If there is no eligible target, this move will fail. Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a damaging move this turn. Inflicts 1.5× the damage that move did to the user. If there is no eligible target, this move will fail. Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a damaging move this turn. Inflicts 1.5× the damage that move did to the user. If there is no eligible target, this move will fail. Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.

short_effect.sun_moon: Strikes back at the last Pokémon to hit the user this turn with 1.5× the damage.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Strikes back at the last Pokémon to hit the user this turn with 1.5× the damage.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Strikes back at the last Pokémon to hit the user this turn with 1.5× the damage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.
